text: This is a list of Peruvian billionaires based on an annual assessment of wealth and assets compiled and published by Forbes magazine in 2020. == 2020 Peruvian billionaires list == {| class="wikitable" !World Rank !Name !Citizenship !Net worth (USD) !Source of wealth |- |468 |Carlos Rodriguez- Pastor | |3.9 billion |finance |- |1511 |Ana Maria Brescia Cafferata | |1.3 billion |mining, banking |- |} == See also == * The World's Billionaires * List of countries by the number of billionaires == References == Category:Lists of people by wealth Net worth
title: List of Peruvians by net worth
